original_title: □ I I II III III III II I I □
overview: The Pharmacist's house, the New System of Squares and the Pirrello house: three projects made for the town of Gibellina Nuova (Trapani, Sicily) by architects Franco Purini and Laura Thermes. A dialogue between three architectural projects: on fragmentation and accuracy.
title: □ I I II III III III II I I □
